text: Sumo (ej mu'minon), caro dar ʙorai munofiqon du guruh sudaed, ki ʙaroi sumo soista nest, dar mavridi onho ducori istiʙoh saved va sak kuned? Hol on ki Alloh onhoro ʙa saʙaʙi kirdori ʙadason va ʙa saʙaʙi on ci ancom dodaand, sarnagun soxtaast. Ojo mexohed kasero hidojat kuned, ki Alloh uro gumroh kardaast? Va har kasro ki Alloh az dinas gumroh sozad, ʙaroi u rohi hidojat naxohi joft
